column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Haven't been here in years and am in town for work and decided to head back. I love tapas and this place is perfect for it! Usually order 3 plates for each person at your table for sharing. We ordered the passion fruit sangria- very good and they use real fruit. For plates- goat cheese with tomato
column6: and garlic shrimp. Everything was so good especially the dates and the empanada. Also by checking in you get a free desert- caramelized bananas were so good!! Would go back again- cool atmosphere and great service!
